      • save

        public static byte[] save(ByteDataUtil.ByteData data)
                   throws IOException
        存储数据
        抛出:

      • restore

        public static void restore(byte[] bs,
                           ByteDataUtil.ByteData data)
                    throws IOException
        恢复数据
        抛出:
        IOException

      • setBitMask

        public static byte setBitMask(byte data,
                              int bit,
                              boolean value)
        参数:
        data - The current data.
        bit - Location of bit to set, indexed from 1 right to left.
        value - Whether to enable or disable the bit.
        返回:
        The modified data.

      • hasBitMask

        public static boolean hasBitMask(byte data,
                                 int bit)
        参数:
        data - The current data.
        bit - Location of bit to extract, indexed from 1 right to left.
        返回:
        True if the bit is enable, false else.
